I've removed the WIP tag because I'm satisfied with the implementation and tests (of course there could always be more testing, but I believe the critical concepts of the Feature System are being adequately tested now).

There are still two caveats for this PR:

1. One of the tests is using `Eigen` to show how a single "feature" can be used to construct an API for both 2D and 3D simulations (see `test/MockCenterOfMass`). `Eigen` is useful for this because the `Eigen` data structures can be templated on the dimensionality of the matrix/vector. This means that the tests currently depend on `Eigen`, and we need to use the current `default` branch of `ign-cmake`.

2. We need to use the `BetterPluginRegistration_DllManagement` branch of `ign-common`, because that's where proper support for template interfaces is introduced. I'll look into getting the `ign-plugin` repo into serviceable shape to be used by `ign-physics`, but my time available for ignition work this week might be somewhat limited.
